charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 846 Conspiracy to distribute crack cocaine (Sch. II) (Ct. I:2/20/98) (1)

charges.charge_disposition: BOP for 262 months; 5 Yrs Supervised Release w/special conditions; S/A $100.00 (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c) Use and carry a firearm during and in relation to a drug trafficking crime (Ct. II:1995) (2)

charges.charge_disposition: BOP for 60 months to be served consecutive to Cnt.1; 2 Yrs Supervised Release w/special conditions to be concurrent with S/R term imposed in Cnt.1. S/A $50.00 (2)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1)&;846 Distribute 50 grams or more of a mixture containing a detectable amount of cocaine base, commonly known as"crack"cocaine(schedule II controlled substance) [1:98-m-1042]
